idea-plugin.name: Aqim As-Salat
idea-plugin.description:
🕌 Aqim As-Salat

Aqim As-Salat is a productivity and spiritual well-being plugin designed for Muslim developers using Android Studio or IntelliJ IDEA. It helps you stay mindful of your daily Islamic prayers (Salat) without disrupting your workflow.

  • 🕰️ Daily Prayer Notifications – Timely reminders for Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha based on your location.
  • 🔔 Custom Alerts – Choose silent, pop-up, or sound notifications.
  • 🕌 IDE Auto-Close (Optional) – Prompt or auto-close IDE during prayer times to help you pause work and focus on worship.
  • 🌍 Location-Based Timing – Automatically fetches prayer times with support for major calculation methods (Umm al-Qura, ISNA, MWL, etc.).
  • 🧭 Qibla Direction (Planned) – An integrated Qibla compass feature is coming soon.
  • ⚙️ User-Friendly Settings – Customize prayer time offsets, methods, and notifications via a clean settings panel.
